content: sts chain 1 turn fasten_off go back to row 4 and skip st attach yarn in next st with a slip_stitch 5 2 chain 1 half_double_crochet in same st as join half_double_crochet in next 5 sts chain 1 turn leaving remaining sts unworked on row 4 6 2 slip_stitch in first st chain 1 half_double_crochet in next 4 sts chain 1 turn leaving last st unworked go back to row 4 and skip st attach yarn in the last st with a slip_stitch 5 3 chain 1 half_double_crochet in same st half_double_crochet in next 7 sts chain 1 turn leaving one st unworked 6 3 slip_stitch in first st chain 1 half_double_crochet in next st half_double_crochet in next 6 sts chain 1 turn 7 half_double_crochet in the next 6 sts leaving a st unworked chain 4 half_double_crochet in next 4 sts chain 4 skip st half_double_crochet in last 6 sts chain 1 turn 8 half_double_crochet in each st and chain across your stitch count should still be 24 nose 9 half_double_crochet in next 11 sts 2 slip_stitch 11 half_double_crochet chain 1 turn 10 half_double_crochet in next 10 sts chain 4 skip half_double_crochet 2 slip_stitch half_double_crochet 10 half_double_crochet chain 1 turn designed by crochet by those_yellow_things your source for unique handmade items 11 half_double_crochet in each st and chain across check your stitch count to make sure you still have 24 12-13 2 row half_double_crochet in each st chain 1 turn mouth we will be working in separate sections again 14 1 half_double_crochet in next 10 sts chain 1 turn 15 1 slip_stitch in first st chain 1 half_double_crochet in next st half_double_crochet in next 8 sts chain 1 turn 16 1 half_double_crochet in next 8 sts chain 1 turn leaving a st unworked fasten_off go back to r13 and skip 4 sts attach yarn in 5th st with a slip_stitch 14 2 half_double_crochet in same st as join half_double_crochet in next 9 sts chain 1 turn 15 2 half_double_crochet in next 9 sts chain 1 turn leaving a st unworked 16 2 slip_stitch in first st chain 1 half_double_crochet in next st half_double_crochet in next 7 sts chain 1 turn 17 half_double_crochet in next 7 sts chain 10 skip half_double_crochet the space we created and first half_double_crochet on other half half_double_crochet in last 7 sts chain 1 turn 18 half_double_crochet in each st and chain across chain 1 turn check to make sure you have 24 sts 19-21 3 row half_double_crochet in each st across chain 1 turn continue to boarder after row 21 boarder line up an inside panel behind the front face panel short side going through both layers single_crochet in each of the 21 sts chain 1 and rotate to long side long side going through both layers evenly place 24 scs along edge chain 1 and rotate to short side short side going through both layers single_crochet in each of the 21 sts chain 1 and rotate to long side and set aside designed by crochet
